name: Boba Shop AU
description:
This is a prototype for a game designed in the ZenoJam gamejam. 

You work in a Bobatea shop, and your main task is to serve the customers. It's hard - you have no clue what type of teas they would like - and there is quite a lot combinations!

And they talk to you about their problems and you feel the unholy urge to mingle with their lives.

The game is aimed at mobile, but at this point it can be tried out on Windows, too, because we are not at THAT point yet.

You can start it, read the help (that's the setting for now), then play through one customers dialogues, then you will reach one ending.

Then you should kill the app, because there is NO EXIT. 

...

And the app is everywhere. Sorry, joking. Just on your screen.

BTW, the theme is that if you interact with the humans, your presence will linger with them, and soon you will  be everywhere. Or something liket that.

Created with Ink, Unity and a splash of LOVE, some lime and strawberries.
